GET /api.description: Serves a JSON representation of all available endpoints of the API.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles. Users can also query by author, topic, sort_by, and order.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an object containing the article ID searched for.

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of objects containing comments for a particular article.

exampleResponse.body: This is a bad article name

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Allows a user to add a comment to a specific article. Required information includes a username and body. Returns the posted comment.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Allows a user to alter the number of votes for an article.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Allows a user to delete a comment. Returns status 204, indicating no content will be returned to the user.

GET /api/articles?sort_by=x&&order=y.description: Allows the user to sort data by a specific column and provide an order.

GET /api/users/:username.description: Serves user data for the specified username.

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Allows a user to increment or decrement votes for the specified comment_id. Returns the comment with the updated vote count.
